title: Employment Agreement

obligations.description: Serve as Senior Software Engineer and report to Chief Technology Officer, develop enterprise-level applications, mentor junior developers, and make architectural decisions.
Provide employee with salary, performance bonuses, health insurance, retirement benefits, and paid time off.

special_terms: Employee agrees to maintain confidentiality of all proprietary information.
Non-Compete Period: 12 months post-employment within 100-mile radius of headquarters.
termination_conditions: Either party may terminate with 30 days written notice.
3 months base salary upon termination without cause.
Termination for cause: Breach of confidentiality, gross negligence, or policy violation.
